actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study conducted by the Department of Veterans Affairs.
short_title: Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study Act of 2020

summary.text:
Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study Act of 2020

This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to submit a report on the Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study, which is a pilot program under which veterans who have recently undergone surgery related to atrial fibrillation utilize VA-issued smart watches to monitor their heart health.

titles.title: Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study Act of 2020
Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study Act of 2020

A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the Veteran Engagement Through Electronic Resources and Notifications Study conducted by the Department of Veterans Affairs.
